Module grupo25_projeto
Package blackjack

Interface GameState

All Known Implementing Classes:
BettingState, DealingState, DoubleState, PlayingState, SidesState, SplittingState
public interface GameState
This is an interface for the game state (for example for the betting stage or the side stage, where side rules apply)
